string.text: {=Tqa0r78b}{?IS_RIGHT}Right {TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} is doing hit and run.{?}{\?}{?IS_LEFT}Left {TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} is doing hit and run.{?}{\?}
{=Tqa0r78d}{TROOP_NAMES_BEGIN}{?IS_PLURAL} and {?}{\?}{TROOP_NAMES_END} are charging at {?IS_PLURAL}different enemy formations{?}an enemy formation{\?}.
{=Tqa0r782}Cavalry is forming a flying wedge in front of infantry.
{=Tqa0r783}Form flying wedge in front of infantry
{=RBM2327cc95}Our plan is to attack with full force and flank with archers.
{=RBM86330Dcc}Our plan is to split infantry and crush them from all sides.
{=RBMD582df2e}Our plan is to bait them with skirmishers then crush them with full focre.
{=RBM24Ef50F5}Our plan is to form a defensive line with archers on flanks.
{=RBM14ecD61c}Our plan is to charge head-on with our cavalry then crush disorganized formations.
